title: StoryGen
description: StoryGen is an AI experiment aimed at making narratives accessible. Describe elements and the AI turns them into real-time narratives, primarily focused on children's stories.

body.raw:
## Project Overview

**Name**: StoryGen ðŸ“–  
**Organisasjonsnummer**: 919 598 107  
**Email**: iverfinne@gmail.com  
**Created by**: @tastefinger  

## How It Works

- **Create unique stories**: Enter a short description of elements like characters, settings, actions, or other ideas.
- **Generate a story**: Click the "Generate Story" button to use AI technology for creating a unique and engaging story.
- **Try your luck**: For those uncertain of what to write, clicking the "Try your luck" button fills the text field with a random sample text for story generation.

## Future Plans

The goal is to continue development and implement new features to enhance the user experience. Each month, a new charitable cause is selected to contribute to. Visit the GitHub page for updates and opportunities to contribute to the project.

## Supporting a Good Cause

This month, contributions are being made to support Dr. Bayan. The project aims to contribute to society through technological innovation and inspire creativity and curiosity in both the young and old.

## Stats

- **Stories Generated**: 401 stories
- **Support Options**: Contributions for further development can be made.

## Technical Setup

- **Requirements**: OpenAI API key and a StoryGen API key are required.
- **Local Setup**: Run `npm install` and `npm run dev` to start your server at http://localhost:3000

## Contact

- **GitHub**: [lukketsvane](https://github.com/lukketsvane)
- **Email**: iverfinne@gmail.com
